userreviews.userReview: "My First Fun Golf Steps (My First Travel Books)" by John and Anna Othitis is another wonderful children's picture book, as the title says, dedicated to Golf. A team of cute and beautifully drawn animals make up the team that explains and illustrates the basics of the game: Tools and etiquette of the game with simple and easy to understand language.Living next door to a Gold course the book stroke a particularly good note with me. Lovely, thoughtful, artisti with high production values.An excellent gift for children of entusiastic golfers.

Children come along and have fun learning the game and recognizing the rules and tools of golf. Parents can certainly consider this book to be a great gift for the young golfer in the family.A team of cute and beautifully drawn animals makes up the team, explaining and illustrating the basics of the game of golf. Teachers and pros would love this book as a teaching tool on the golf course.A fun read where children will remember the ethics of the game prior to playing golf with Mom and Dad. They will love this book like no other !!!Recommended for children who would love to join "the World of Golf."**** This cute little children’s Golf book was gifted to me for an honest review.****

I love golf but I am a total klutz, so I was happy to read this children's book provided by the author in exchange of a honest review. My First Fun Golf Steps is everything you'd like to know if you were a kid willing to learn how to play golf. As an adult, I found it so funny, colourful and engaging (and useful!) that I can't even imagine how much children's would love it. Next steps for me will be to gift this great book to my cousins and then... start playing golf for real!

A wonderful introduction to the game of golf and also to any number of exotic animals that are beautifully illustrated. Aimed at children, the young at heart will also find it intriguing. This is an original idea that ticks all the right boxes and is a steal at the current price. If your child has any interest at all in the game of golf (even if it's just a hit in the backyard), grab a copy and share the experience. You will not regret it.

My First Fun Golf Steps by John and Anna Othitis is a great children's picture book! Every child interested in golf will love this beautifully illustrated book and I recommend this as a gift for every child. Golf is a wonderful game and all children would love to learn it from this book! This is a Guaranteed fun learning guide for all beginners!

Adorable - Golf for Children!Golf for kids? I love it. An adorable children's story with beautiful illustrations. If Daddy (or Mummy for that matter!) plays golf - this is a great little insight for young and will help them grasp an interest of the game.

I didn't read this, my kids did. I asked the oldest what he would give the book between 1 and 5 with 5 being the best and 1 being the worst. He said 5 and he would read it again. That's a win, in my book :) anything that gets kids reading is good by me!
A clever and original use of travel and animals as a primer for teaching the game of golf to children. Well done.
This is a great little book for the future little golfer! Colorful and entertaining, it explains the game of golf in a way that every child will love. The book would make a wonderful gift....btw
This is a very interesting book. Children will definitely enjoy reading this great book. The author has done a great job.
Well Done! This is an exceptional children’s introduction to golf. It is written with humor and sensitivity. Also, the illustrations are well done and fun to view.
A great book for little golfers giving all the rules and do's and dont's with beautiful illustrations. Lovely cute kiddies book. ages 4-9 yrs. Recommended and family fun on the gold course.

Anyone with rug-rats, grubs or sprogs will appreciate this delightful picture book. It's a great read for tiny human beings whether they are into golf or not - the illustrations are fantastic. As a way of keeping kids amused this book is a winner.
A great little introduction to golf!
A great book about golf for kids!
This is a good introduction for children to golf, and makes great use of animals and pets to help the kid learn.
As I golfer myself, I enjoyed reading this to my nephew
What a creative way to get your child into golf. Every kid loves animals and picture books. This is brilliant. Love it.
I thoroughly enjoyed this book! I offered a completely novel way on how to introduce golf to kids, and it succeeds in doing so, flawlessly I might add. Well worth the read!
Full review to follow
What a nice way to get children interested in golf. It's very visual, colorful and fun.

description: Children's First Golf Steps is a start to introducing them to the game of Golf with the animals of Africa. Read learn and enjoy these cute little illustrations for children ages 3 -7 year. Enjoy and have fun playing golf with us.
title: My First Fun Golf Steps (My First Travel Books Series)
